cs309.isucytes.review

Interface ReviewRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Review,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Review,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Review>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Review,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface ReviewRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,java.lang.Integer>
    Repository class for Review domain objects All method names are compliant with Spring Data naming conventions so this interface can easily be extended for Spring Data See here: http://static.springsource.org/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/jpa.repositories.html#jpa.query-methods.query-creation

      java.lang.Double avgReviewsByPoiId(java.lang.Integer poi)
      This SQL query returns the average rating of the reviews whose POI field matches the argument's.
      java.util.List<Review> findByFlagged(boolean flagged)
      This query returns a list of Reviews that have flagged set to true.
      java.util.List<Review> findByPoi(java.lang.Integer poi)
      This query returns a list of Reviews given a POI.

    • Method Detail

      • findByPoi

        java.util.List<Review> findByPoi(java.lang.Integer poi)
        This query returns a list of Reviews given a POI.
        Parameters:
        poi - the POI field to search for in all reviews.
        Returns:
        the list of reviews whose POI field match the argument's.

      • avgReviewsByPoiId

        @Query(value="select avg(r.rating) from Review r where r.poi = :poi")
java.lang.Double avgReviewsByPoiId(@Param(value="poi")
                                                                                                          java.lang.Integer poi)
        This SQL query returns the average rating of the reviews whose POI field matches the argument's.
        Parameters:
        poi - The POI field to find reviews by.
        Returns:
        A double of all the averages for the reviews found.

      • findByFlagged

        java.util.List<Review> findByFlagged(boolean flagged)
        This query returns a list of Reviews that have flagged set to true.
        Parameters:
        flagged - The boolean parameter to find Reviews by.
        Returns:
        A list of reviews that are flagged if flagged is set to true.
